sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Navbar />

  <!-- text: Props-->
  <Event :text="text"/>
  <SearchBar :data="data_temp"
  @searchMovie="handleSearchMovie"/>
  <!-- $event로 emit의 파라미터를 받음 -->
  <Movies 
    :data="data"
    @openModal="handleModalOpen"
    @increaseLike="handleIncreaseLike" 
  />
  <!-- :data (v-bind)로 Modal로 보냄, 마찬가지로 :isModal, :selectedMovie로 해서 Modal로 보냄 (v-bind)-->
  <Modal 
  :data="data_temp" 
  :isModal="isModal" 
  :selectedMovie="selectedMovie"
  @closeModal="isModal = false"
  />
  </template>
<script>
import movie from './js/movie';  // export default로 내보낼 때 이용
import NavBarComponent from './components/Navbar.vue';
import ModalComponent from './components/Modal.vue';
import EventComponent from './components/Event.vue';
import MoviesComponent from './components/Movies.vue';
import SearchBarComponent from './components/SearchBar.vue';

export default {
    name: 'App',
    data() {
      return {
        isModal: false,
        data: movie,
        data_temp: [...movie], // 영화 데이터 사본
        selectedMovie: 0,
        text: "NETFLIX 강렬한 운명의 드라마, 경성크리처",
      }
    },
    methods: {
      handleModalOpen(payload) {
        this.isModal = true; // 모달창을 열기
        this.selectedMovie = payload.index; // payload는 객체로 전달됨, key는 인덱스값
        // payload는 객체로 전달됨, key는 인덱스값  
        // selectedMovie에 현재 클릭한 영화의 인덱스를 넣어줌
      },
      handleIncreaseLike(payload) {
        this.data[payload.index].like += 1;
        // payload는 객체로 전달됨, key는 인덱스값  
      },
      handleSearchMovie(payload) {
        let title = payload.movieName.trim(); 
        this.data_temp = this.data.filter(movie => ({
          if(movie.title.includes(title)) {
            console.log(movie.title);
          }
        }))
      }
    },
    components : {
      Navbar: NavBarComponent,
      Modal: ModalComponent,
      Event: EventComponent,
      Movies: MoviesComponent,
      SearchBar: SearchBarComponent,
    }
}
</script>

<style>
* {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  margin: 0;
}

body {
  max-width: 768px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 20px;
}

h1,
h2,
h3 {
  margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

p {
  margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

button {
  margin-right: 10px;
  margin-top: 1rem;
}

.item {
  width: 100%;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  display: flex;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  padding: 1rem;
}

.item figure {
  width: 30%;
  margin-right: 1rem;
}

.item img {
  width: 100%;
}

.item .info {
  width: 100%;
}

.modal {
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
  position: fixed;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

.modal .inner {
  background: #fff;
  width: 80%;
  padding: 20px;
  border-radius: 10px;
}
</style>
